title: Image Features
content:

[[module css]]
div.image-example {
	border: 0.0625rem dashed rgb(var(--swatch-menubg-medium-dark-color));
	background-color: rgb(var(--swatch-menubg-light-color));
	margin: 0;
	padding: 1em !important;
}

#page-title, h1, h2, h3, h4, .centered {
	text-align: center;
}

h2 {
	margin-bottom: 0;
	padding-bottom: 0;
}

h3 {
	margin-top: -0.4em;
}

span.pointer {
	font-family: var(--body-font);
	display: inline-block;
	height: 0.8125rem;
	line-height: 0.750rem;
	line-height: 0.8125rem;
	font-size: 0.625rem;
	font-size: 0.6875rem;
	background: rgb(var(--swatch-primary-darkest));
	color: rgb(var(--swatch-menutxt-light-color));
	-webkit-border-bottom-right-radius: 0.25rem;
	   -moz-border-radius-bottomright: 0.25rem;
	        border-bottom-right-radius: 0.25rem;
	-webkit-border-top-right-radius: 0.25rem;
	   -moz-border-radius-topright: 0.25rem;
	        border-top-right-radius: 0.25rem;
	margin: 0 0 0 .75rem;
	padding: 0.1875rem 0.3125rem 0.1875rem 0;
	-webkit-user-select: none;      
	-moz-user-select: none; 
	-ms-user-select: none;
	user-select: none;

}

span.pointer::before,
span.pointer::after {
	float: left;
	position: relative;
}

span.pointer::before {
	content: "";
	top: -0.1875rem;
	left: -0.625rem;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
	border-color: transparent rgb(var(--swatch-primary-darkest)) transparent transparent;
	border-style: solid;
	border-width: 0.5rem 0.5rem 0.5rem 0;
	padding: 0 0.0625rem 0.1875rem;
}

span.pointer::after {
	--box-shadow: rgb(var(--swatch-primary-darkest));
	content: "";
	top: 0;
	left: -0.5rem;
	width: 0.5rem;
	height: 1rem;
	color: rgb(var(--swatch-menutxt-light-color));
	-webkit-box-shadow: -0.0625rem -0.0625rem 0.125rem var(--box-shadow);
	   -moz-box-shadow: -0.0625rem -0.0625rem 0.125rem var(--box-shadow);
	        box-shadow: -0.0625rem -0.0625rem 0.125rem var(--box-shadow);
	font-size: 1rem;
	line-height: 0.6em;
	-webkit-mask-image: url("data:image/svg+xml,%3C%3Fxml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'%3F%3E%3Csvg version='1.2' baseProfile='tiny' id='Layer_1' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' xmlns:xlink='http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink' x='0px' y='0px' viewBox='0 0 26.5933838 19.6584473' overflow='visible' xml:space='preserve'%3E%3Cpolygon fill='%23FFFFFF' points='26.5933838,5.1333008 7.7148438,5.1333008 7.7148438,0 0,9.6740723 7.7148438,19.6584473 7.7148438,14.0671387 26.5933838,14.0671387 '/%3E%3C/svg%3E%0A");
	        mask-image: url("data:image/svg+xml,%3C%3Fxml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'%3F%3E%3Csvg version='1.2' baseProfile='tiny' id='Layer_1' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' xmlns:xlink='http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink' x='0px' y='0px' viewBox='0 0 26.5933838 19.6584473' overflow='visible' xml:space='preserve'%3E%3Cpolygon fill='%23FFFFFF' points='26.5933838,5.1333008 7.7148438,5.1333008 7.7148438,0 0,9.6740723 7.7148438,19.6584473 7.7148438,14.0671387 26.5933838,14.0671387 '/%3E%3C/svg%3E%0A");
	-webkit-mask-repeat: no-repeat;
	        mask-repeat: no-repeat;
	-webkit-mask-size: 1rem auto;
	        mask-size: 1rem auto;
	background-color: rgb(var(--swatch-menutxt-light-color));
}

@media only screen and (max-width:500px) {
	span.pointer {
		width: -webkit-calc(100% - 1rem);
		width: -moz-calc(100% - 1rem);
		width: calc(100% - 1rem);
		height: auto;
    padding-left: 0.5rem;
    line-height: 1.5em;
	}
	span.pointer::before {
		dislay: none;
	}
	span.pointer::after {
		-webkit-mask-image: url("data:image/svg+xml,%3C%3Fxml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'%3F%3E%3Csvg version='1.2' baseProfile='tiny' id='Layer_1' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' xmlns:xlink='http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink' x='0px' y='0px' viewBox='0 0 19.6584473 26.5933838' overflow='visible' xml:space='preserve'%3E%3Cpolygon fill='%23FFFFFF' points='14.5251465,26.5933838 14.5251465,7.7148438 19.6584473,7.7148438 9.984375,0 0,7.7148438 5.5913086,7.7148438 5.5913086,26.5933838 '/%3E%3C/svg%3E%0A");
		        mask-image: url("data:image/svg+xml,%3C%3Fxml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'%3F%3E%3Csvg version='1.2' baseProfile='tiny' id='Layer_1' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' xmlns:xlink='http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink' x='0px' y='0px' viewBox='0 0 19.6584473 26.5933838' overflow='visible' xml:space='preserve'%3E%3Cpolygon fill='%23FFFFFF' points='14.5251465,26.5933838 14.5251465,7.7148438 19.6584473,7.7148438 9.984375,0 0,7.7148438 5.5913086,7.7148438 5.5913086,26.5933838 '/%3E%3C/svg%3E%0A");
		-webkit-mask-size: contain;
		        mask-size: contain;	
		mask-position: center center;    
	}
}
[[/module]]

+ What is this?
[[=]]
**A collection of alternative {{[image blocks]}} that provide extra interactivity to the images in your Articles, SCPs, Tales, or whatever the heck you want!**
[[/=]]

+ How to use
[[=]]
Most are self-explanatory but there are a few shared features:
[[/=]]
[[ul_]]
[[li]]**THESE WORK ON BOTH SIGMA-9 AND BLACK HIGHLIGHTER**[[/li]]
[[li]]**Any {{true/false}} options must be included.**[[/li]]
[[li]]**Images can be floated.** This means text will wrap around them. If you chose {{|float=true}} you also need to pick {{|align=left/right}}. This will choose what side of the screen the image will float on.[[/li]]
[[li]]**Width is max-width.** On mobile, images will always be max-50% screen width. If you want to change this, you'll have to edit CSS values:
[[div class="code"]]
.scp-image-block[data-feature="image-feature"] {
@@	@@max-width: [add width here] !important;
}
[[/div]][[/li]]
[[li]]**Captions are optional!** If you chose {{|add-caption=false}}, you do not need to include a {{|caption=text}}.[[/li]]
[[li]]**Alt Text is Recommended!** All images have an {{|alt=alt|alt-text=Image Description Here}} option. This can be omitted but it is recommended to add it for accessibility. The alt-text should describe the image being shown.[[/li]]
[[li]]Fractal Noise Reveal and Pixelate Reveal both use HTML in iframes which are... a little odd on Wikidot. They //should// work but there is certainly a chance they will bug out.[[/li]]
[[li]]If you have any more questions or requests feel free to contact [[*user Woedenaz]]. No guarantee that I'll respond quickly but I'll try![[/li]]
[[/ul]]

++ Multi-Line Captions
[[=]]
You **can** have multi-line captions. 
You just need to format the code like so:
[[/=]]
[[div_ class="code"]]
@@|add-caption=true@@
@@|caption=This is a super duper long caption that is eventually going to have a line break. _@@
@@You just need to add a space WITH an underscore after. _@@
@@Remember the space or it will not work. _@@
@@Adding a space after the underscore will also cause it not to work.@@
[[/div]]
~~~~

~~~~
+ IMAGE REVEALS

++ Hover Blur Reveal
+++ Tap Blur Reveal on Mobile
[[div_ class="image-example"]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:image-features-source |blur-reveal=--]
|blur-amount=1.5
|speed=60
|float=false
|width=18.75rem
|url=noodle.jpg
|alt=alt|alt-text=A metal bowl containing a flat piece of pasta against a blue backdrop.
|add-caption=true
|caption=Lots of blur might end up looking really odd
]]

[[div_ class="code"]]
@@[[include :scp-wiki:component:image-features-source |blur-reveal=--]@@
|blur-amount=Number [[span class="pointer"]]1.5 - 5 Recommended. Higher number = More blur![[/span]]
|speed=Number [[span class="pointer"]]Animation speed in milliseconds[[/span]]
|float=true/false 
|align=left/right
|width=px/rem/vw/% [[span class="pointer"]]All measurement types work here.[[/span]]
|url=url
|alt=alt|alt-text=Image Description Here
|add-caption=true/false 
|caption=text
]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
~~~~

++ Hover Blur Change Image
+++ Tap Blur Change Image on Mobile
[[div_ class="image-example"]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:image-features-source |image-change=--]
|blur-amount=20
|speed=1000
|float=false
|width=18.75rem
|start-url=noodle.jpg
|hover-url=scp-4378-noodleverse.png
|alt1=alt|alt1-text=A metal bowl containing a flat piece of pasta against a blue backdrop.
|alt2=alt|alt2-text=A black and white image of a mass of pasta hidden in the spectrograph of an audio file.
|add-caption=true
|caption=This works best if both images share the same width to height ratio.
]]

[[div_ class="code"]]
@@[[include :scp-wiki:component:image-features-source |image-change=--]@@
|blur-amount=Number [[span class="pointer"]]1.5 - 5 Recommended. Higher number = More blur![[/span]]
|speed=Number [[span class="pointer"]]Animation speed in milliseconds[[/span]]
|float=true/false
|align=left/right
|width=px/rem/vw/% [[span class="pointer"]]All measurement types work here.[[/span]]
|start-url=url [[span class="pointer"]]URL of image BEFORE hover.[[/span]]
|hover-url=url [[span class="pointer"]]URL of image AFTER hover.[[/span]]
|alt1=alt|alt1-text=Image 1 Description Here
|alt2=alt|alt2-text=Image 2 Description Here
|add-caption=true/false
|caption=text
]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

++ Hover Slide Blur Reveal
+++ Tap Slide Blur Reveal on Mobile
[[=]]
**Firefox supported blur slide code provided by [[*user EstrellaYoshte]]!**
[[/=]]
[[div_ class="image-example"]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:image-features-source |slide-blur-reveal=--]
|blur-amount=5
|slide-direction=right
|speed=640
|float=false
|width=18.75rem
|url=noodle.jpg
|alt=alt|alt-text=A metal bowl containing a flat piece of pasta against a blue backdrop.
|add-caption=true
|caption=The slide direction means it will move AWAY that direction.
]]

[[div_ class="code"]]
@@[[include :scp-wiki:component:image-features-source |slide-blur-reveal=--]@@
|blur-amount=Number [[span class="pointer"]]5 - 10 Recommended. Higher number = More blur![[/span]]
|slide-direction=left/right/top/bottom [[span class="pointer"]]Direction slide will move AWAY from.[[/span]]
|float=true/false
|align=left/right
|speed=Number [[span class="pointer"]]Animation speed in milliseconds[[/span]]
|width=px/rem/vw/% [[span class="pointer"]]All measurement types work here.[[/span]]
|url=url
|alt=alt|alt-text=Image Description Here
|add-caption=true/false
|caption=text
]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
